src:
Adrien Rabiot Masuk Daftar Transfer Manchester United
04 Nov 2019, 19:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Klub Premier League, Manchester United diberitakan memiliki target transfer baru. Setan Merah diberitakan akan mengejar tanda tangan Adrien Rabiot di musim dingin nanti.
Manchester United saat ini tengah kekurangan stok gelandang. Hal ini dikarenakan mereka kehilangan sosok Ander Herrera yang pndah ke PSG di musim panas kemarin.
United sendiri sempat dirumorkan akan mendatangkan sejumlah gelandang baru. Namun hingga bursa transfer musim panas ditutup, tidak ada pemain yang merapat ke Old Trafford sehingga MU diberitakan akan mencoba lagi di bulan Januari nanti.
Le Journal du Dimanche mengklaim bahwa United memiliki target baru untuk lini tengah mereka. Setan Merah diyakini akan mencoba merekrut Adrien Rabiot di bursa transfer yang akan datang.

Mengapa United ingin merekrut Rabiot? Simak informasinya di bawah ini.
text:
Adrien Rabiot is on Manchester United's transfer list
Nov 04 2019, 19:20 by Bola.net
Soccer - Premier League club Manchester United are reported to have a new transfer target. Red Devils are reported to be chasing the signature of Adrien Rabiot in the winter.
Manchester United is currently lacking in midfield stock. This is because they lost the figure of Ander Herrera who went to PSG last summer.
United itself was rumored to be bringing in a number of new midfielders. But until the summer transfer window closes, no players close to Old Trafford, so MU is reported to be trying again in January.
Le Journal du Dimanche claims that United have a new target for their midfield. Red Devils are believed to be trying to recruit Adrien Rabiot in the upcoming transfer market.

Why does United want to recruit Rabiot? Check out the information below.
